trans-unit.source: How Azure App Service Works
trans-unit.target: How Azure App Service Works

trans-unit.source: Learn how App Service work
trans-unit.target: Learn how App Service work

trans-unit.source: How App Service Works
trans-unit.target: How App Service Works

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service is a cloud services designed to solve the practical problems facing engineers today.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service is a cloud services designed to solve the practical problems facing engineers today.

trans-unit.source: App Service is focused on providing superior developer productivity without compromising on the need to deliver applications at cloud scale.
trans-unit.target: App Service is focused on providing superior developer productivity without compromising on the need to deliver applications at cloud scale.

trans-unit.source: App Service also provides the set of features and frameworks necessary to compose enterprise Line-of-Business applications while meeting developers where they are with support for most popular development languages (.NET, Java, PHP, Node.JS and Python).
trans-unit.target: App Service also provides the set of features and frameworks necessary to compose enterprise Line-of-Business applications while meeting developers where they are with support for most popular development languages (.NET, Java, PHP, Node.JS and Python).

trans-unit.source: With App Service developers can:
trans-unit.target: With App Service developers can:

trans-unit.source: Build truly scalable Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Build truly scalable Web Apps

trans-unit.source: Quickly build Mobile App back-ends with a set of easy to use mobile capabilities such as data back-ends, user authentication and push notifications with Mobile Apps.
trans-unit.target: Quickly build Mobile App back-ends with a set of easy to use mobile capabilities such as data back-ends, user authentication and push notifications with Mobile Apps.

trans-unit.source: Implement, deploy and publish APIs with API Apps.
trans-unit.target: Implement, deploy and publish APIs with API Apps.

trans-unit.source: Tie business applications together in workflows and transform data with Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: Tie business applications together in workflows and transform data with Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: All App types rely on the scalable and flexible Web App platform which allows developers an optimized full lifecycle experience from App design to App maintenance.
trans-unit.target: All App types rely on the scalable and flexible Web App platform which allows developers an optimized full lifecycle experience from App design to App maintenance.

trans-unit.source: The lifecycle capabilities allow developers to:
trans-unit.target: The lifecycle capabilities allow developers to:

trans-unit.source: Quick App Creation - start from scratch or pick an OSS package from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: Quick App Creation - start from scratch or pick an OSS package from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: Continuous Deployment - automatically deploy new code from popular source control solutions such as TFS, GitHub and BitBucket and sync content from online storage services such as OneDrive and DropBox.
trans-unit.target: Continuous Deployment - automatically deploy new code from popular source control solutions such as TFS, GitHub and BitBucket and sync content from online storage services such as OneDrive and DropBox.

trans-unit.source: Test in Production - smoothly create pre-production environments and manage the portion of traffic going to them.
trans-unit.target: Test in Production - smoothly create pre-production environments and manage the portion of traffic going to them.

trans-unit.source: Debug in the cloud when needed and roll back if issues are found.
trans-unit.target: Debug in the cloud when needed and roll back if issues are found.

trans-unit.source: Run asynchronous tasks and batch jobs - execute code in a background process or activate your code based on events (such as massages landing in an Azure Storage Queue) and scheduled times (CRON).
trans-unit.target: Run asynchronous tasks and batch jobs - execute code in a background process or activate your code based on events (such as massages landing in an Azure Storage Queue) and scheduled times (CRON).

trans-unit.source: Scale the app - use one of many options to scale your service horizontally and vertically automatically based on traffic and resource utilization.
trans-unit.target: Scale the app - use one of many options to scale your service horizontally and vertically automatically based on traffic and resource utilization.

trans-unit.source: Configure private environments dedicated to your Apps
trans-unit.target: Configure private environments dedicated to your Apps

trans-unit.source: Maintain the app - leverage many of the debugging and diagnostics features to stay ahead of problems and to efficiently resolve them either in real time (with features such as auto-healing and live debugging) or after the fact by analyzing logs and memory dumps
trans-unit.target: Maintain the app - leverage many of the debugging and diagnostics features to stay ahead of problems and to efficiently resolve them either in real time (with features such as auto-healing and live debugging) or after the fact by analyzing logs and memory dumps

trans-unit.source: Put together, the App Service capabilities allow developers to focus on their code and reach a stable, highly scalable production state quickly.
trans-unit.target: Put together, the App Service capabilities allow developers to focus on their code and reach a stable, highly scalable production state quickly.

trans-unit.source: With the API and Logic App features, developers can build real-world enterprise applications bridging barriers between business solutions as well as on premise to cloud integration.
trans-unit.target: With the API and Logic App features, developers can build real-world enterprise applications bridging barriers between business solutions as well as on premise to cloud integration.
